title: Cannondale Launches Tesoro Neo Carbon – A Lightweight E-Commuter
content:
Cannondale’s latest urban e-bike adds a lightweight Bosch Class 3 motor and a carbon frame derived from the Synapse road bike.

Read the full article at Cannondale Launches Tesoro Neo Carbon – A Lightweight E-Commuter on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
